name: Diamandi
description:
• Arrow keys to move
  • Dodge the creeps! 
  • Pick up shields, they protect from a one creep hit and destroy the creep.
  • More creeps will spawn the longer you  last.

Includes the art of Diamandi  artbook .pdf and 
Diamandi soundtrack .wav

 made in Godot, see the code :   https://github.com/dygnyc/diamandi

a game by Donny Yi George
https://www.donnys.art/
